verses.roman:
deśe āsi' dui-jane gelā nija-ghare
kata dine baḍa-vipra cintita antare

synonyms: deśe āsi'-after returning to their own country; dui-jane—both of them; gelā—went; nija-ghare—to their respective homes; kata dine—after some time; baḍa-vipra—the elderly brāhmaṇa; cintita—very anxious; antare—within.
translation: After returning to Vidyānagara, each brāhmaṇa went to his respective home. After some time, the elderly brāhmaṇa became very anxious.
